name: rockies thrummed mittens
notes:
rockies thrummed crochet mittens

keep your hands warm and your crochet hook happy with the rockies thrummed crochet mittens — part of the free first fall 2025 cozy mitten make-along with marly bird!

these mittens combine simple single crochet stitches with fluffy thrums made from roving yarn, creating a soft, fleece-like interior that’s as fun to make as it is to wear.

 why you’ll love this pattern:

unique thrummed crochet technique for extra warmth and texture

bulky weight yarn = fast finish and cozy results

perfect project for gift-giving or keeping for yourself

sized for everyone: child (small adult, medium adult, large adult)

 join the free make-along:
get the full free pattern and follow along with the community during the first fall 2025 cozy mitten make-along at:
 [https://marlybird.com/blog/first-fall-2025-cozy-mitten-make-along/][1]

✨ pattern upgrade available:
upgrade to the ad-free pdf with exclusive bonuses, printable gift & care tags, extra hand warmer patterns, and full video tutorials — all inside the marly bird house.
 [https://marlybird.thrivecart.com/first-fall-2025-crochet/?ref=ravelry][2]

perfect for adventurous beginners and experienced makers alike, the rockies mittens are your ticket to learning a fun new crochet technique — and toasty hands all season long.

skill level: intermediate
yarn: bulky weight wool + roving (for thrums)
hook: j [6 mm] or size to obtain gauge
